scripts.setup: pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && cd apps/http-backend && pnpm install && cd ../ws-backend && pnpm install && cd ../excelidraw-frontend && pnpm install && cd ../../packages/db && pnpm exec prisma migrate dev && pnpm exec prisma generate
scripts.start-all: cross-env NODE_ENV=production turbo run build --filter=http-backend --filter=ws-backend --filter=web && concurrently "cd apps/http-backend && pnpm start" "cd apps/ws-backend && pnpm start" "cd apps/excelidraw-frontend && pnpm run build && pnpm start"
